title: Duck and wild mushroom risotto
ingredients: ['10 g (scant 1/2 oz) dried porcini mushrooms', '300 ml (10 fl oz) boiling water', '750 ml (1¼ pints) hot vegetable stock', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '2 duck breasts, about 340 g (12 oz) in total, skinned', '1 red onion, finely chopped', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '340 g (12 oz) risotto rice', '150 ml (5 fl oz) dry white wine', '1 tsp finely grated lemon zest', '2 tsp chopped fresh thyme', '15 g (½ oz) butter', '450 g (1 lb) mixed fresh mushrooms, such as oyster mushrooms, ceps and shiitake, sliced if large', '3 tbsp chopped parsley', 'salt and pepper']
